About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri by appointment only; closed weekends and public holidays. Reference assistance is available, and arrangements must be made at the time of appointment.

About.Access: One week's advance notice is required and proof of identity may be requested.

About.Acquisition focus: Administrative records of the Northern Territory University and its predecessors; staff and student records; records of academic significance.

About.Major holdings: Records of the University Planning Authority; Darwin Institute of Technology; Northern Territory College of Advanced Education; Darwin Community College; Northern Territory Council of Advanced Education; University College of the Northern Territory.
